text.more: This network graph represents the co-occurrence of keywords extracted from CERME 14 papers and posters. Each node corresponds to a keyword, with its size reflecting its weighted degreeâ€”the total number of connections it has, weighted by co-occurrence frequency. Node colors represent modularity classes, grouping keywords into clusters based on their connections, revealing key research themes and interdisciplinary links within the mathematics education community.
text.intro: A network graph visualizing the co-occurrence of keywords in CERME 14 papers and posters. Node size represents weighted degree, and node color indicates modularity class.
text.title: Keyword Co-occurrence Network of CERME 14 Papers and Posters
